display.name: Test Event #0
description: Very first event made just as a test

mainMenuText: This mod just has been completely rewritten for 1.14.4 version! Yay. What does that mean?
Well since it was complete rewrite, I tried to polish all systems as much as possible. There's completely new animation system, new loot generation system and more...
- Each gun has different attributes and can accept different attachments
Allows creation and running of many different gamemodes ranging from battleroyale to classic team deatchmatch. Play against your friends or AI
No more manual chest placing. Just place down loot generator, run command or start a game and the loot will be generated when needed! Also it's customizable with datapacks
